channel.title: vegetarian on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in vegetarian on Recipes

item.title: Soft Cheese Vegetables
item.description: Prep Cook Serves 10 min 10 min 2-3 Ingredients 1 bunch asparagus, sliced into 4-6" chunks. Recommend slicing 1" off bottoms and composting. 1 jalapeno 1/2 lbs mushrooms 2 bell peppers, sliced Garlic and herb soft spreadable cheese (I like alouette brand) Heavy cream (Optional) bacon bits (exclude if making vegetarian version) (Optional) other veggies you enjoy! Steps Wash and chop all veggies Fry veggies in skillet over medium heat.

item.title: Erdbeertorte
item.description: My favorite strawberry cake, family recipe :) Prep Cook Serves 1 hr 10 min 1 cake Ingredients 500g fresh strawberries, washed, de-stemmed, and cut in halves. Ingredients for 500mL vanilla pudding (dealers choice recipe, I like 500mL milk + 40g cornstarch + vanilla) 1 packet Tortenguss/gelatin Steps Go make the Tortenboden (cake base). Once somewhat cool, prepare the vanilla pudding and pour it into the cake base.

item.title: Vanillekipferl
item.description: German holiday shortbread cookies, nutty and dusted in powdered sugar Prep Cook Serves 30 min 12-15 min not sure, please count when you try this recipe Ingredients 300g flour 3 eggs 80g sugar 2 tbsp vanilla extract 2 packets vanille sugar (8g per packet) 125g finely chopped almonds (pieces not bigger than a nerds candy) 250g soft butter, cut in small cubes enough powder sugar to coat the cookies Steps Combine flour, sugar, eggs and vanilla in a bowl to a soft dough.

item.title: Zupfkuchen
item.description: Almost a cheesecake but not as sweet. My dad’s favorite. Prep Cook Serves 1 hr 1 hr 1 cake Ingredients Dough 300g flour 150g sugar 200g butter, melted 2 eggs 40g cocoa powder 2 tsp baking powder Filling 120g sugar 3 eggs 500g greek plain yogurt (full fat) 250 ml heavy cream 1 dash salt 2 tsp real vanilla 70g butter 2 envelopes gelatin 4 tbsp corn starch Steps Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and cocoa in a large bowl.

item.title: Tzatziki
item.description: For gyros, baked potatoes, and raclette. Prep Cook Serves 30 min 0 min 2-3 cups Ingredients 1 big cucumber (or two small ones) 1 container (454g) full-fat greek yogurt (I like Fage 5%) 1 container sour cream (only dairy, no other additives) 1 1/2 tbsp garlic powder 3 tbsp dried dill 1/2 tsp salt 1 tsp sugar (optional) Steps Shred the cucumber into a bowl with the finest setting on a grater.
